attributes.action: Make it law that shops must turn lights off when closed
attributes.additional_details:
In this energy crisis situation which everyone is facing and we are talking about electricity cuts for hours in coming months and prices of energy is shooting up - it really scares us to see the wastage of electricity in shops at night .
I believe that we have smart cameras now which can record any moments if lights are turned off in case of theft. 
we have climate chnage talks every year  looking for solutions but it really saddnes to see that we have solution in front of us and we are not taking any actions for the lights  which are a huge wastage on climate
attributes.background: make a law to close shops light at night or take strict actions against it

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624797
